sentences.en: About other people's lifestyles, I have absolutely no opinions whatsoever.
sentences.cn: 是关于人们的生活模式, 我绝对不评论.

sentences.en: All things whatsoever ye would that men should do to you, do ye even so to them.
sentences.cn: 你想别人对你怎样, 你就怎样对人.

sentences.en: And the problem is that they take exception to any kind of noise whatsoever.
sentences.cn: 问题是他们反感任何形式的噪音。

sentences.en: But there should be no Christmas for me, I knew, no gifts, no remembrance whatsoever.
sentences.cn: 但我知道，对我来说，将没有圣诞节可言，没有礼物，没有怀念，什么都没有。

sentences.en: For my part, I abominate all honorable respectable toils , trials, and tribulations of every kind whatsoever.
sentences.cn: 拿我来说, 一切尊贵的, 叫人敬重的劳动 、 考验和折磨都使我乏味.

sentences.en: I don't take any drugs whatsoever, except aspirin for colds.
sentences.cn: 我什么药都不吃，除了感冒时吃阿司匹林。

sentences.en: I don't think they'll have any idea how I'm feeling. None whatsoever.
sentences.cn: 我认为他们并不了解我的感受，一点儿都不了解。

sentences.en: In fact, there are many programs that contain no arithmetic whatsoever.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 在许多程序中根本不包含有算术运算.

sentences.en: My school did nothing whatsoever in the way of athletics.
sentences.cn: 我的学校在体育方面无所作为。

sentences.en: Square up everything whatsoever that is has been necessary to buy.
sentences.cn: 该买的就买,一次付清帐.

sentences.en: The police found no suspicious document whatsoever.
sentences.cn: 警察未发现任何可怀疑的文件.

sentences.en: Their daily menus bore no resemblance whatsoever to what they were actually fed.
sentences.cn: 他们每天的食谱和他们实际吃到的东西完全不同。

sentences.en: There has been no news whatsoever.
There is absolutely no doubt whatsoever that this woman was a totally devoted and caring mother.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问这位女士是一位无私的慈母。

sentences.en: Total regurgitation of swallowed material without any nausea whatsoever suggests esophageal obstruction.
sentences.cn: 将所进食物全部反出而不伴任何恶心,即说明有食管梗阻.

sentences.en: You'd feel better without any nightcaps whatsoever!
sentences.cn: 睡前什么也不喝你会感觉更好!

trans.tran_en: You use whatsoever after a noun group in order to emphasize a negative statement
